chapters.title: Chapter 21: A World of Dreams
chapters.info: Rosel of Essam, p. 237 (187)—Someone who wrote books around the year 200 A.B. (after the Breaking). She claimed that over 100 pages of a book Verin has the sole surviving page of survived the Breaking; Verin has studied the one page that still survives thousands of times. The book supposedly contained secrets that Rosel thought the world was not prepared to face.
